Draft Rating:

B-

Stan Van Gundy ranks in the 64th percentile for drafting among executives in our database. Van's draft picks average out to be worth the equivalent of 2 spots higher than they were picked due to his good drafting.
Some of their biggest wins:
  • Drafted Spencer Dinwiddie with 38th pick but was worth 8th pick.
  • Drafted Darrun Hilliard with 38th pick but was worth 26th pick.
Some of their biggest busts:
  • Drafted Stanley Johnson with 8th pick but was worth 44th pick.
  • Drafted Luke Kennard with 12th pick but was worth 26th pick.
  • Drafted Henry Ellenson with 18th pick but was worth 29th pick.

Trade Rating:

B+

Stan Van Gundy ranks in the 77th percentile for trading among executives in our database.
Their biggest win:
  • Added Reggie Jackson to DET.
  • Lost Thomas Bryant to UTA.
  • Lost D.J. Augustin, Kyle Singler, Isaiah Roby to OKC.
Their biggest L:
  • Added Avery Bradley, Isaiah Roby to DET.
  • Lost Marcus Morris to BOS.

Signing Rating:

A

Stan Van Gundy ranks in the 92th percentile for free agency signings among executives in our database.
Their best signings:
  • Signed Andre Drummond in 2016.
  • Signed Reggie Jackson in 2015.
  • Signed Boban Marjanović in 2016.
Their worst signings:
  • Signed Langston Galloway in 2017.
  • Signed Aron Baynes in 2015.
  • Signed Ish Smith in 2016.
